name: Paper Dodger
description:
Game works best in downloaded form.

In Paper Dodger you must avoid being hit by paper airplanes!!!

You gradually get points.

Paper airplanes will come from the right side of the screen and you must avoid them for as long as possible, you  can use the up and down arrow keys to do this. If you get hit by a paper airplane then you must press r to restart the game!

Credits:

Art by me

Music by timbeek.com

I used the Godot documentation for one piece of code when making the game.
